edu.cmu.commons.util.app
Class Application

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.commons.util.app.Application

public abstract class Application
extends Object

A basic base class for cmdline utility applications.

run

public abstract int run()
                 throws UsageException,
                        Exception
Extension point for derived Application classes.

Returns:
a status value to pass to System.exit(int). Zero signals success.
Throws:
UsageException - on any error deemed by the application to be a usage (user) error.
Exception - on any other error.
